atbat.des: Mauro Gomez doubles (5) on a fly ball to left fielder Ichiro Suzuki.
atbat.des_es: Mauro Gomez pega doble (5) con elevado a jardinero izquierdo Ichiro Suzuki.

pitch.cc: CC Sabathia had Mauro Gomez down 0-2 but could not put him away.

atbat.des: Ryan Lavarnway flies out sharply to right fielder Nick Swisher. Mauro Gomez to 3rd.
atbat.des_es: Ryan Lavarnway batea elevado de out fuertemente a jardinero derecho Nick Swisher en jugada de infield fly. Mauro Gomez a 3ra.

atbat.des: Jarrod Saltalamacchia pops out to third baseman Eric Chavez in foul territory.
atbat.des_es: Jarrod Saltalamacchia batea elevadito de out a tercera base Eric Chavez en territorio de foul.

pitch.cc: CC Sabathia showed faith in Russell Martin by throwing that slider in the dirt with a runner on 3rd.

atbat.des: Robinson Cano homers (31) on a fly ball to center field.
atbat.des_es: Robinson Cano batea jonrón (31) con elevado por el jardín central.

atbat.des: Mark Teixeira called out on strikes.
atbat.des_es: Mark Teixeira se poncha sin tirarle.

atbat.des: Nick Swisher singles on a sharp ground ball to center fielder Che-Hsuan Lin.
atbat.des_es: Nick Swisher pega sencillo con rodado fuerte a jardinero central Che-Hsuan Lin.

atbat.des: Curtis Granderson homers (41) on a fly ball to right field. Nick Swisher scores.
atbat.des_es: Curtis Granderson batea jonrón (41) con elevado por el jardín derecho. Nick Swisher anota.

atbat.des: Play reviewed and stands as called: Russell Martin homers (21) on a fly ball to right center field.
atbat.des_es: Jugada revisada sin cambios: Russell Martin batea jonrón (21) con elevado entre los jardines derecho y central.
Eric Chavez recibe base por bolas.

pitch.cc: Dangerous count for Clay Buchholz; Eric Chavez is a dead-red fastball hitter, with a .933 OPS against them this season and .836 against everything else.

atbat.des: Derek Jeter walks. Eric Chavez to 2nd.
atbat.des_es: Derek Jeter recibe base por bolas. Eric Chavez a 2da.

atbat.des: Ichiro Suzuki singles on a ground ball to right fielder Cody Ross. Eric Chavez to 3rd. Derek Jeter to 2nd.
atbat.des_es: Ichiro Suzuki pega sencillo con rodado a jardinero derecho Cody Ross. Eric Chavez a 3ra. Derek Jeter a 2da.

atbat.des: Alex Rodriguez out on a sacrifice fly to left fielder Daniel Nava. Eric Chavez scores.
atbat.des_es: Alex Rodriguez out con elevado de sacrificio a jardinero izquierdo Daniel Nava. Eric Chavez anota.

atbat.des: Robinson Cano doubles (47) on a line drive to center fielder Che-Hsuan Lin. Derek Jeter scores. Ichiro Suzuki scores.
atbat.des_es: Robinson Cano pega doble (47) con línea a jardinero central Che-Hsuan Lin. Derek Jeter anota Ichiro Suzuki anota.

action.des: Pitching Change: Alfredo Aceves replaces Clay Buchholz.

atbat.des: Mark Teixeira homers (24) on a fly ball to right field. Robinson Cano scores.
atbat.des_es: Mark Teixeira batea jonrón (24) con elevado por el jardín derecho. Robinson Cano anota.

atbat.des: Nick Swisher doubles (35) on a line drive to right fielder Cody Ross.
atbat.des_es: Nick Swisher pega doble (35) con línea a jardinero derecho Cody Ross.

atbat.des: Curtis Granderson grounds out to first baseman Mauro Gomez.
atbat.des_es: Curtis Granderson batea rodado de out a primera base Mauro Gomez.

pitch.cc: That was pitch number 15 for Alfredo Aceves; his effectiveness may start slipping, as he holds opposing hitters to a .202 average in the first 15 pitches but they hit .346 off him after that.
